data.text: E, minriang kaom Theophilus: Luk 1:1-4
amakha marwaantiang ikal nikhuo katung matiangnga Ratha Inthiang ranak ah ama ikadang tirton ngaidiang iminchu ngaikha kamajia jei.

Ajarchu athisuo nuk, aringnookjei tihi inthiangtak ah jetnasik nisoom mili tirton ngaidiang pha katamtak inlaar kha inmani'n inleimu; halli ama'n inmanile inruoiya Pathian Rengram jarra alei-inbiakpui.

Halli inmanile ininchun lai, inmani diang hiwa chongpehi aleipeii, “Jerusalem mathaan maru, takkha kapa'n chong-inkhit ah kanapese iti kutchoi kha, nangni diangnga kei'n kiril kha leingaakru; Luk 24:49
Ajarchu John in tuiya baptize atho, takkha nangnichu nikhuo lekkhat suo ah Ratha Inthiangnga baptize anathosik eii.” Matt 3:11; Mk 1:8; Luk 3:16; Jn 1:33
Khawa jarra tirton ngai'n Jisu le ininmupha, amadiang inheirakel, “Pumi, hiwa phahin Israel ngai Rengram kha nang in napekirnook sikbe?”
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Kapa amatak ranak ah ida apha emakli akum-atha kha angtik ka-esikme nangni jetsik emak.

Takkha Ratha Inthiang in nangni chungnga ajuochum phakhan, nangni'n ranak ah sipningte; halli nangni'n Jerusalemma, Judea khat-um Samaria, halli manmasituol ahekna katuungnga keisik sakhi ning-esik eii.” Matt 28:19; Mk 16:15; Luk 24:47,48
Hiwa rakip arilsuoli, inmani'n ama in-enna in-omlai, amakha marwaantiang akaljei, khawasuoa suumphai inkhat in amakha inmani mit-enna inphut amalia jei. Matt 16:19; Luk 24:50,51
Inmani'n Jisu marwaan laitiang ikal kha inmit ah in-enna in-omlai, puondiar kabang kasil mi inni jetlei-theileiya inmani koolla inleingir;
halli inmani'n inti, “Galilee mi-ngai, nangni angsikme marwaantiang ning-enna ningngir? Nangni diangnga inphut marwaanna kakal Jisu hi ningmu angnga ama lajuonooksik eii.”
Khawasuo tirton ngai'n khuopui makheiya mile herkhat kapuo kalaak Olive ching makheiya Jerusalem khan inheikirjei.

Halli inmani'n khopui inluutpha, Peter le John, James khat-um Andrew, Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew khat-um Matthew, Alphaeus sapa James, Zealot inti Simon halli James sapa Judas inmani leiomna chung inn khan inleikaljei. Matt 10:2-4; Mk 3:16-19; Luk 6:14-16
Inmani'n nupui ngaile Jisu anu Mary khat-um ama nai ngaile akanisik ah inlei-intuup jol.
Halli nikhuo lekkhat thengsuoli ka-ngamna mi ngai inraja ah rajakhatle soomni daam inlei-intuup ah, chongkarilsik Peter aleingir.
“E ka-u ka-nai ngai,” Jisu kasur inmani lamkakei Judas jarra David mursuoa Ratha Inthiang in matiang ileiminril “Pathian chongkha hongkatung sik-eii.
Judas kha eini karra inkhat eii, ajarchu eini chuon suungnga ama'n chan inkhat amusik ah inkadangsa inkhat eii.”
(Judas ama'n achuontho kathamak khanna imu sial khan lei inkhat aracho, halli alu nuoitiang makaiya, awon cheiikhoiya asuung-aril rakip asuok suo ah athijei. Matt 27:3-8
Jerusalemma kaom mirakip in hiwa jarhi inleijetjei, hiwa jarra lei kha inmani chongnga Akeldama, tichu “Thisenlei” intia inleiphuo.)
“Ajarchu Minpakla larik suungkhan hiwahi injia,

“Khawa jarra John in baptize thona achong rilni makheiya inphut Pumi Jisu'n eini diangnga inphut marwaantiang ikal nikhuo katung, eini karra Pumi Jisu'n asi-ahongnga alei-omlai lei-inruoipui mi-ngai karra inkhat einile inruoiya Pumi Jisu hongringna sakhi ana-epuisik eii.” Matt 3:16; Mk 1:9; 16:19; Luk 3:21; 24:51
Khawa jarra inmani'n mi inni, Joseph intia inkoi Barsabbas, aphung Justus inti khat-um Matthias kha inleikadang.
Halli inmani'n Pathian inniya, mirakip malung kajetpi, nang in nikadang inni ngai karra inkhat kha keinidiang namalarpiro, “Kinpumi,
asinasik munna kasijei Judas rathuulla tirton inkhat ah nachuon kathosik inmani inni ngai karra tume nikadang kha keinidiang naminmuro.”
Inmani'n rasi in-enna rasi kha Matthias chungnga chuljei; halli amakha tirton soomleikhat ngai karra inthundeljei.
